title: Articles 3(a) and 4 (in so far as it relates to Article 3(a)) of the following Order,
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Environmental Expenditure
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Environmental Expenditure 

Survey) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (environmental expenditure survey) order 2024

title: Articles 3(a) and 4 (in so far as it relates to Article 3(a)) of the following Order,
heading: 2. (1) In this Order -
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order - 

the European 
“Regulation” means Regulation (EU) No. 691/2011 of 
Parliament and of the Council of 6 July 20111, as amended by Regulation (EU) 
No. 538/2014 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 16 April 20142 
and Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2022/125 of 19 November 20213; 

“Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006” means Regulation (EC) 1893/2006 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 20 December 20064, as amended by 
Regulation (EC) No. 295/2008 of the European Parliament and of the Council 
of 11 March 20085, Regulation (EU) No. 70/2012 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 18 January 20126 and Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 20 June 2019;7 

“survey” means the Environmental Expenditure Survey that is conducted by 
the Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining information specified 
in the Schedule- 

(a) 

from undertakings referred to in Article 3(a), including for the 
purposes of compliance with the Regulation in so far as it relates 
to Annex IV thereto, and 

(b) 

from undertakings referred to in Article 3(b). 

1 OJ No. L 192, 22.7.2011, p. 1 
2 OJ No. L 158, 27.5.2014, p. 113 
3 OJ No. L 20, 31.1.2022, p. 40 
4 OJ No. L 393, 30.12.2006, p. 1 
5 OJ No. L 97, 9.4.2008, p. 13 
6 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p. 1 
7 OJ No. L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 241 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 12th March, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [93] 3 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulation has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulation, other than 
where the context otherwise requires.

title: Articles 3(a) and 4 (in so far as it relates to Article 3(a)) of the following Order,
heading: 3. This Order applies to an undertaking that –
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to an undertaking that – 

(a) 

(b) 

is classified for statistical purposes under section B, C, D or 
division 36 of NACE Rev. 2 as set out in Annex I to Regulation 
(EC) No. 1893/2006, or 

is classified for statistical purposes under any section or division 
of NACE Rev. 2 as set out in Annex I to Regulation (EC) No. 
1893/2006 other than those referred to in paragraph (a).
text_norm: 3 order applies undertaking - (a) (b) classified statistical purpose section b c division 36 nace rev 2 set annex regulation (ec) no 1893 2006 classified statistical purpose section division nace rev 2 set annex regulation (ec) no 1893 2006 referred paragraph (a)

title: Articles 3(a) and 4 (in so far as it relates to Article 3(a)) of the following Order,
heading: 4. A requirement on undertakings to whom this Order applies to provide,
text_raw:
4. A requirement on undertakings to whom this Order applies to provide, 
once only and for the purposes of the survey, information in relation to each 
year in the period from 2022 to 2026, the general nature of which is specified 
in the Schedule, is hereby prescribed. 

 
 
 
 
 4 [93]
text_norm: 4 requirement undertaking order applies provide purpose survey information relation year period 2022 2026 general nature specified schedule hereby prescribed 4 93

title: Articles 3(a) and 4 (in so far as it relates to Article 3(a)) of the following Order,
heading: Article 4

title: Articles 3(a) and 4 (in so far as it relates to Article 3(a)) of the following Order,
heading: Information regarding the following, as it relates to environmental
text_raw:
1. 

Information regarding the following, as it relates to environmental 
protection expenditure incurred by the undertaking concerned during the year 
to which the information relates: 

(a) 

capital expenditure on the purchase of - 

(i) 

pollution treatment equipment, and 

(ii) pollution prevention equipment; 

(b) operating expenditure on - 

(i) 

the purchase of environmental protection products and 
services, 

(ii) 

environmental protection equipment, and 

(iii) environmental protection staff.
text_norm: 1 information regarding following relates environmental protection expenditure incurred undertaking concerned year information relates (a) capital expenditure purchase - (i) pollution treatment equipment (ii) pollution prevention equipment (b) operating expenditure - (i) purchase environmental protection product service (ii) environmental protection equipment (iii) environmental protection staff

title: Articles 3(a) and 4 (in so far as it relates to Article 3(a)) of the following Order,
heading: Information regarding
text_raw:
2. 

Information regarding 

to resource 
management expenditure incurred by the undertaking concerned during the 
year to which the information relates: 

the following, as 

it relates 

(a) 

capital expenditure on the purchase of equipment; 

(b) operating expenditure on - 

(i) 

the purchase of resource management products and 
services, 

(ii) 

resource management equipment, and 

(iii) resource management staff.
text_norm: 2 information regarding resource management expenditure incurred undertaking concerned year information relates following relates (a) capital expenditure purchase equipment (b) operating expenditure - (i) purchase resource management product service (ii) resource management equipment (iii) resource management staff

title: Articles 3(a) and 4 (in so far as it relates to Article 3(a)) of the following Order,
heading: Information on the time taken by the undertaking concerned to
text_raw:
3. 

Information on the time taken by the undertaking concerned to 
complete the questionnaire, form or other record prepared by the Director 
General for the collection of the information referred to in paragraphs 1 and 2. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 March, 2024. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach.
